Last week, I gave a presentation about developing __R packages__ with Bioconductor. The slides are available [here](http://welch16.rbind.io/bioc_slides/2019_01_creating_bioc_package#1)

```{r bioc_slides,include=TRUE,echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE}

knitr::include_url("http://welch16.rbind.io/bioc_slides/2019_01_creating_bioc_package#1")

```

Besides the slides, I created a format based on the amazing [ninjutsu, kunoichi](https://emitanaka.github.io/ninja-theme/themes/kunoichi/kunoichi-theme-example.html#1) with the [Bioconductor colors](https://github.com/welch16/create_bioc_package/blob/master/assets/bioctheme.css).
